doc.title: Zebby's Zoo
doc.plot: Zebby's Zoo consists of live-action, animation and puppets combined with lively song and dance routines, educational and theatrical dialogue. The fresh, upbeat music and good-natured humor makes the program popular with children as well as their parents alike. This program, which follows the adventures of Zebby the talking zebra, along with his friends, Lazy Lion, Stomper the elephant, and all their other friends, educates children through music. Zebby's Zoo is a fun, exciting place for children where they will love to sing along to the music while learning valuable lessons at the same time.
